entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Quinte West
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 6:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain in the morning and ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
